content: What I find hilarious is that Pepsi have managed to piss off both the Right and the Left in one fell swoop. The Left-wingers are offended because Pepsi appropriated their struggle. The Right-wingers are offended because Pepsi tried to sugarcoat Left-wing violence. We can’t agree on much, but we seem to agree that Pepsi’s ad department (or consultants) have no idea what they’re doing.
